item.title: My First Post
item.description: First posts Programming C programming #include <stdio.h> int main(int argc,char* argv[]){ printf("hello world bitch"); return EXIT_SUCCESFULLY; } Python programming # prime numbers are greater than 1 if num > 1: # check for factors for i in range(2, num): if (num % i) == 0: # if factor is found, set flag to True flag = True # break out of loop break # check if flag is True if flag: print(num, "is not a prime number") else: print(num, "is a prime number") Math Calculus [\int_{a}^{b} f(x) dx = F(b) - F(a)]
item.content:
First posts

Programming

C programming

#include <stdio.h>

int main(int argc,char* argv[]){
    printf("hello world bitch");
    return EXIT_SUCCESFULLY;
}

Python programming

# prime numbers are greater than 1
if num > 1:
    # check for factors
    for i in range(2, num):
        if (num % i) == 0:
            # if factor is found, set flag to True
            flag = True
            # break out of loop
            break

# check if flag is True
if flag:
    print(num, "is not a prime number")
else:
    print(num, "is a prime number")

Math

Calculus

[\int_{a}^{b} f(x) dx = F(b) - F(a)]
